100.name: Full Metal Jacket
100.description: Shots pop through 4 layers of bloon, and both bullets and shrapnel can pop Lead and Frozen Bloons.

200.name: Large Calibre
200.description: Shots can pop through 7 layers of Bloon.

300.name: Deadly Precision
300.description: 20 damage per shot, plus bonus damage to Ceramics.

400.name: Maim MOAB
400.description: Deals much more damage and immobilizes MOAB class bloons for a short time.

500.name: Cripple MOAB
500.description: Crippled MOABs are immobilized for longer and take extra damage from all other attacks.

010.name: Night Vision Goggles
010.description: Allows Sniper to detect and do an additional 2 damage to Camo bloons.

020.name: Shrapnel Shot
020.description: Damaged bloons spray out a cone of sharp shrapnel.

030.name: Bouncing Bullet
030.description: Shots bounce to new targets up to 3 times.

040.name: Supply Drop
040.description: Supply Drop ability: Drops a crate full of cash. Regular attack also damages Lead Bloons and increases Shrapnel popping power.

050.name: Elite Sniper
050.description: Supply Drop gives much more cash. Grants Elite targeting prio and faster reload to all snipers.

004.name: Full Auto Rifle
004.description: Fully automatic weapon with incredible popping power.

005.name: Elite Defender
005.description: A lost life gives this Sniper 4x attack speed for a short time in retaliation. Also attacks faster the further the Bloons are along the track. Deals more damage to MOAB-class Bloons.
